General.Name: Ganesh Housing Corporation Limited
General.Description: Ganesh Housing Corporation Limited engages in the real estate and construction businesses in India. It is involved in the promotion and development of residential, commercial, and infrastructure projects. The company has a land bank of approximately 500 acres. Ganesh Housing Corporation Limited was founded in 1965 and is based in Ahmedabad, India.

4.Name: Mr. Bhavin H. Mehta
4.Title: Pres of Corp. Affairs & Chief Marketing Officer
